title: Parlance Labs
text:
Parlance Labs 
 A research lab and consultancy focused on LLMs. 

        
            
            
            
            
            
            
        





Contact
Email: contact@parlance-labs.com or DM me.




Specialties

Fine-tuning
Evaluation systems
LLM-Ops: serving, monitoring, CI/CD
Software engineering

We have been working on LLMs way before they were cool and have deployed ML systems in production at scale. We focus on pragmatic solutions that work in the real world.

Partners

Hamel Husain - full-stack ML eng.
Johno Whitaker - generative AI researcher.
Jeremy Lewi - platform eng, co-founder of Kubeflow.
Wayde Gilliam - NLP engineer, creator of blur.
